title: bug: meet bug when build docker images
body:
### ðŸ› Bug Report

#### ðŸ“ Description
Meet error when try to build docker image.

#### ðŸ”„ Reproduction Steps
Two ways to reproduction it: 
> PWD: project_root_dir
1. `docker build -f ./docker/server-v2/Dockerfile .` 
2. `zk stack docker-setup` 
      will meet error when execute first image, the command as below: 
     * `DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker buildx build -t us-docker.pkg.dev/matterlabs-infra/matterlabs-docker/server-v2:docker-linux-amd64 -t matterlabs/server-v2:doker-linux-amd64  --platform=linux/amd64  -f ./docker/server-v2/Dockerfile .`

#### ðŸ¤” Expected Behavior
Successfully build images using both ways mentioned above.

#### ðŸ˜¯ Current Behavior
will meet error 
#### ðŸ–¥ï¸ Environment
22.04.1-Ubuntu  x86_64

#### ðŸ“‹ Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here. If applicable, add screenshots to help explain.

#### ðŸ“Ž Log Output
